verses.name: Nehemiah 12:31
verses.text: Then I brought up the princes of Judah upon the wall, and appointed two great companies of them that gave thanks, whereof one went on the right hand upon the wall toward the dung gate:

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:32
verses.text: And after them went Hoshaiah, and half of the princes of Judah,

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:34
verses.text: Judah, and Benjamin, and Shemaiah, and Jeremiah,

verses.name: Nehemiah 12:35
verses.text: And certain of the priests’ sons with trumpets; namely, Zechariah the son of Jonathan, the son of Shemaiah, the son of Mattaniah, the son of Michaiah, the son of Zaccur, the son of Asaph:
